name: Prompt Receiver
description: Receives a prompt from a UI widget via an event and passes it to the next node.

name: Fail Always
description: The 'Fail Always' module is attempting to act...

name: Advanced Web Scraper (Selenium)
description: Extracts data from modern websites that use JavaScript, by controlling a real browser. Now with caching.

name: Agent Host
description: Acts as an autonomous agent on the canvas, using connected nodes as its tools, brain, and prompt to achieve a high-level objective.

name: Image Viewer
description: Displays an image in a popup window from a local file path provided by the payload or manual input.

name: Agentic Web Scraper
description: Deploys an autonomous AI agent to navigate websites, interact with elements, and extract information to fulfill a high-level objective.

name: Email Sender
description: Sends an email via an SMTP server. The recipient, subject, and body can be configured or taken dynamically from the payload.

name: Spreadsheet (Excel) Manager
description: Reads rows from or writes new rows to an Excel file (.xlsx, .xls). Supports sheet, row, and column selection.
